title: Straw
overview: A date on Samhain leads to an abode of true crime, death, and the mildewed scent of carnage.

title: Autemials - Concert for EC Foreign Languages Festival 2023
overview: Autemials performed at the Foreign Languages Festival organized annually by Evrensel College in 2023. During the concert, the group played covers of the songs "Losing My Religion" and "Paint It, Black".

title: Autemials - Concert for EC YASD Festival 2023
overview: Autemials performed at the Youth and Sports Day Festival organized annually by Evrensel College in 2023. During the concert, the band played covers of various songs.

title: Permian Dawn
overview: The sun rises over a lone Dimetrodon as we follow it through the landscape of the middle Permian. Included are Diplocaulus, Titanoptera, a speculative proto-archosauromorph, a Xenacanthid shark, and Prionosuchus.

title: Curious Raptor
overview: A curious Pyroraptor spots a cycad seed on the forest floor, and is absolutely tickled pink by it for some reason.

title: Playing Pterosaurs
overview: Two pterodactyloid pterosaurs (maybe Mimodactylus) play along a forested clifftop during the late Cretaceous.

title: Spinosaurus Fishing
overview: Spinosaurus aegyptacus goes fishing in a late-Cretaceous river.

title: Natovenator polydontus
overview: Short opentoonz animation of the recently discovered, semi-aquatic dromaeosaur Natovenator polydontus.

title: Cretaceous Characters - Quetzalcoatlus meets a young Triceratops
overview: Just a short animation of a large azdarchid (perhaps Quetzalcoatlus) and a juvenile Triceratops. All sound design homemade, by me! Just for a bit of fun.

title: Tricotilomanía: Una historia de identidad
overview: Angella develops a rare psychological disorder called trichotillomania, until, through alternative therapy, she discovers that the cause of her problem is directly related to her relationship with her father.

title: How to survive the winter
overview: Deok-nam and Ji-young, now twenty, suddenly find themselves out of foster care, leaving the orphanage. All they have is a mere 5 million won and a carrier. And the winter is bitterly cold and they're hungry. Can these two work together to face the world head-on?

title: Angry Language
overview: An argument between two people about colors turns serious.

title: American Dreams
overview: Expiremental documentary about realizing the difference between what you want to do and what you can do.

title: Hainline in Heaven
overview: Ryan Hainline attempts to do an ollie.

title: Freedom of What
overview: Essay film about the relationship between the idea of freedom and what we actually have.

title: The Cowboy and the LIbrary in the Wake of Stressful Events
overview: Expiremental documentary depicting a "cowboy" monologuing about stress.

title: Marlboro Country
overview: Expiremental collage documentary consisting of juxtapositions between litter and the advertisements of those same products.

title: Kali Uchis: Live at Lollapalooza Brasil 2023
How Not to Deal with Grief
overview: A bunch of 20-something year old Gen-Zs gather at a funeral afterparty to pay respects to their school batchmate who has passed away, except the only problem is that none of them really know how to deal with grief.

title: Bittersweet Memories: 14 Dias Isolados para Fazer um Álbum
The Good, the Bad, and the Bloodthirsty
overview: An old-fashioned western town is thrown for a loop when a mysterious bounty hunter comes to town right as the townsfolk suspect a vampire is in their midst...

title: 洛天依11周年生日音乐会
Internal Noise
overview: Nadine is a girl suffering from OCD, which makes her afraid of many things and makes her feel unsafe in her life.

title: Lulu, Climbing Route Opener
overview: Lucien Abbet, better known as Lulu, is a pioneer of sport climbing and route-breaking in Valais. Although considered one of the best climbers of his generation in the field, his humility and his way of life have never been able to fit with the codes of public notoriety. Money, recognition, material goods have never interested him. He has devoted his entire life to his passion, a happy vagabond, as he likes to say: climbing and traveling.

title: Blind Mind
overview: A young man tries to visualize his thoughts...

title: The Hammer
overview: A man trying to lift up a hammer.

title: Amethyst at the Slayground
overview: January 15th 2023 saw RuPaul's Drag Race Star Amethyst from Season 15 rock the Slayground.

title: Kisses!
overview: Maia is in town for the summer staying with her aunt. She is just catching up with her posh posse from summers previous when they are rather rudely interrupted! Maia meets Jonah, whose skateboard proves dissatisfactory. Yet, the unlikely pair become inseparable with the help of a secret setup. A sweet love story sealed with a kiss!

title: Sayulita Chrome
overview: A small time mugger stumbles into a government conspiracy to produce a drug that lets you see the future, at the cost of requiring the torture of a living human being.

title: Sleep
overview: A short film made by three students who are trying to escape the reality.

title: Sacred Bathing Stories
overview: "Welcome to another "Relatos da Vida do Nosso País". Today, we have with us Mr. João Ezequiel, who will tell us about some events in his life."

title: Suicide Helpline
overview: This short sketch shows us what a day in the life of Teotónio, a suicide hotline operator, is like.

title: Dual Perspektif
overview: A man is sitting at a bar, chatting with a bartender. A young man comes in and sits next to him, shifting the conversation toward the newcomer. Their conversation flows smoothly until they reach a disagreement about politics, which sparks a debate between the two characters.

title: The Fires
overview: Having lived illegally in Canada for the past eight years, Danny Gallagher returns to his family home in rural Donegal. He spends his days isolated, seeking to make sense of the bruises left by his past by recording an audio tape for a person that he no longer knows. Only when the tape is finished, and the house is cleared, can he finally move on.

title: Forbidden Fruit
overview: After a failed heist, thieves Van Buren and Roosevelt journey through a rustbelt town's criminal underbelly in an attempt to save their lives and their relationship.

title: Our Honeymoon
overview: A documentary of a honeymoon to the Pacific Northwest, including plane flights, stops in Portland, Oregon and Coeur D’Alene, Idaho.

title: Artsakh: part 7
overview: Artsakh: Part 2:  It is analyzed by experts-historians and is based on indisputable historical facts.

title: Witnessed
overview: When a son, Daniel Ortiz witnesses his father's brutal murder, he wrestles within himself if he should ignore his values and teachings or become a coldblooded murderer seeking revenge. One step behind him, on the case is Marcus Tillman, a detective with questionable morals and connections that run deep in the dark side of the city.

title: A New Voice
overview: A New Voice is a firsthand look into the upward journey of citizens returning to communities after incarceration. The film sheds some light on the rarely seen success stories of people who have transitioned home from prison and their impact on their communities.

title: Clash For Cash
overview: After the price of their streaming service increases, an eccentric group of thieves take it upon themselves to rob one of the least secure banks in the city.

title: Down A Cent
overview: A homeless woman goes into a local cafe, only to be followed a unknown man walks into the cafe with a more sinister intention in mind

title: Artsakh: part 6
overview: The 6th part of the Artsakh film series tells the story of the history of Artsakh from 1921 to 1960. It is analyzed by experts-historians and is based on indisputable historical facts.

title: Artsakh: part 5
overview: The 5th part of the Artsakh film series tells the story of the history of Artsakh from 1917 to 1921. It is analyzed by experts-historians and is based on indisputable historical facts.

title: Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rule the Stage [Rep LIVE side Rule the Stage Original]
overview: Blu-ray release of character rap project “Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rule the Stage [Rep LIVE side Rule the Stage Original]”.

title: Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rule the Stage [Rep LIVE side D.H]
overview: Blu-ray release of character rap project “Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rule the Stage [Rep LIVE side D.H]”.

title: Artsakh: part 4
overview: It is analyzed by experts-historians and is based on indisputable historical facts. The establishment of Russian rule in Artsakh

title: ARTSAKH: The kingdoms of Khamsa: part 3
overview: Armed Struggle in Artsakh after the 17th Century. It is analyzed by experts-historians and is based on indisputable historical facts. The film tells the story of the period of the Khamsa kingdoms in Artsakh.

title: Solipsism
overview: Set in cosmopolitan London, Aikya, a British-Indian blogger believes she is the only person that exists in the world. Continuing her daily life convinced that every interaction with another is purely a construct in her own world, her beliefs and existence are shattered after she witnesses the ultimately suicide of a neighbour. Thrust into a world unknown, Aikya must process unfounded human emotions, grapple with her solipsism and engage with the idea that she may not be alone after all.

title: This is my fado
overview: Júlia dreams making fado her life, but her father forces her to study law. One day she meets a guitarist and decides to fight for what she believes is her future.

title: Pizza Margherita
overview: Despite its title, this short film explores the delicate and serious theme of sexual harassment.

title: Lone Stars
overview: "Lone Stars" is a heartwarming mockumentary that follows the misadventures of Jo Ellen and Dan Burnevik, a lovable music duo known by all in the vibrant Georgetown, Texas. Their claim to fame is their catchy song "Lonestar," and want nothing more than a sponsorship with the iconic Lone Star Beer. Desperate for marketing material, Jo Ellen and Dan hire two out-of-work filmmakers to shoot content. But after the filmmakers initial attempt at shooting high quality video fails, Jo Ellen and Dan consider hiring a replacement. In an attempt to win them back, the two filmmakers convince one of their friends to act as a Lone Star Beer Executive and convince Jo Ellen and Dan to stick around.

title: Flawless New Amazon Alexa
overview: A boy fights against an oppressive AI that controls his whole life.

title: Footlights
overview: A homeless man alternates between living on the streets and performing on stage. We get a glimpse of the inner pain and frustration that this dual life is causing.

title: Nun - The Beginning !!
overview: Christine, a widowed doctor, seeking advice from priest, finds his connection to her dead husband. What she finds out may cost her...

title: Traveler discovers a Woman running from her Husband & In-laws but then...
overview: A traveler discovers a woman running from some men, upon inquire the traveler discovers they were her family; they claim she is unstable. On the insistence of the woman's husband, the traveler agrees to stay that night with the family.

title: Summer Vacation at the Small Town Ranch House and the Rural Legend !!
overview: On summer vacation Emma goes to a small ranch house. Here everyone knows everyone, and often spends evenings barbecuing together. Emma learns about a rural legend, and against everyone's warning Emma decides to solve the mystery herself.

title: The Mastermind Killer !!
overview: After the shocking murder of the most powerful man in Chicago - George Murphy, police detective Ethan Graham begins investigation to solve the case. The complexity builds up leading to no end. It must have been plotted by a Mastermind.

title: The Manipulative Step Dad !!
overview: On his birthday, Travis, a young boy, was gifted a toy gun by his step-father, Marshall. As Travis attempted to show the to his biological father, he happens to take his own father's life with it. The Toy gun was a real weapon.

title: The Late Night Visitor !!
overview: A happily married woman notices that someone is watching her every night who is not her husband. What does he want with her? What is he after?

title: A Meal's Worth
overview: Past rejection and the loneliness of being a minority isolate Alex in his new school. Until he finds a warm welcome in a lunchbox, an unexpected encounter that makes him feel accepted.

title: Kali
overview: The journey of an artist who is figuring out a mythological character through his art

title: Our Love Is Forever
overview: The Attempt Of A Child Who Doesn't Know That He Died And Trying To Live With His Parents. The Mental Pressure Of A Mother And Father Due To The Death Of Their Only Son, His Son Became A Soul To His Mother And Spend Time With Her The Husband Who Does Not See Any Of This And Hospitalized Her Wife, The Husband, Who Is Taking Care Of His Wife, Suddenly The Police Comes To The Home And Arresting Him Because Of The Wife's Death, What Happened To Their Family The Story Of Tragic Fate.

title: Chicken Nugget Man: The Complete Saga
overview: The legendary saga of Chicken Nugget Man's odyssey from a biological weapon to the one who saved the world.

title: The Skull
overview: In a big abandoned house on a barren hill lives a skull. A brave girl named Otilla has escaped from terrible danger and run away, and when she finds herself lost in the dark forest, the lonely house beckons. Her host, the skull, is afraid of something too, something that comes every night. Can brave Otilla save them both? Steeped in shadows and threaded with subtle wit, The Skull is as empowering as it is mysterious and foreboding.

title: Angurværð
overview: A young immigrant deals with the struggles of the world in iceland. After his new friend (also an immigrant) gets deported he finds a way to deal with the pain.

title: CODEC
overview: An uninvited guest unearths bitter tensions within a friendship group celebrating their graduation.

title: NEW GENERATION THE LIVE ウルトラマンブレーザー編 ～巡る願い星 SIDE ブレーザー～／スターズ編 ～巡る願い星 SIDE スターズ～
NEW GENERATION THE LIVE スターズ編 ～新世代の戦士たち～／ウルトラマンブレーザ
Maurice Baquet, The Accorded
overview: At once a high-level musician, member of the October Group, entertainer, theater artist, film actor, mountaineer, and skier, Maurice Baquet, always on the move, structured his life around two common threads: the cello and the mountains. He once defined himself as a "cellist-skier," "all alone" in this category, which prompted James Couttet, world ski champion, to say: "Of all the skiers I know, he's the best cellist." Echoing this, Professor at the Conservatoire National Supérieur, André Navarra, added: "Of all the cellists I know, he's the best skier." Throughout his varied yet coherent career, Baquet helped to project a joyful and artistic image of the mountains. Who better to talk about Maurice and all his adventures than his alter-ego: Cérébos, the faithful cello that never left his side? From Paris to Chamonix, from the stage to the granite slabs and snowy slopes, this film follows Cérébos, crossing the century and above all... smiling!

title: The Ashes
overview: Death, as well as the opportunity for new life, is a duality that is part of the essence of Placilla de Peñuelas.

title: The Demon Hungers
overview: After Vox's castle and clan were destroyed by Tokugawa Ieyasu in the year 1616, he tended to his wounds in a cave by the ocean until he was awoken by a savage hunger.

title: Team Super
overview: Green Guardian and his sidekick Purple Nurple form Team Super a dynamic duo that defends the city from real criminals with the greatest superpower of all, the power of friendship. Unfortunately their unconventional methods lead them to the wrong side of trouble.

title: Marcel's Piñata
overview: A highly imaginative 10-year-old boy befriends his superhero-themed piñata prior to his birthday party. But upon realizing the tragic fate that awaits for his cardboard companion, he must rebel against the celebratory ritual in order to save his only friend.

title: DJ Freakjuice: Your Baby's Daddy
overview: DJ Freakjuice decides to re-release "You're Baby's Daddy," his #1 hit from 1999, and discovers that the song still has a magical effect on people.

title: Soul Haven
overview: 'Soul Haven' follows Holden, who wakes in a mysterious paradise with no memory of how he got there. He meets George, another inhabitant haunted by fragments of a forgotten past. As they navigate this dreamlike refuge, their bond deepens amid lush Australian landscapes. The film is a poetic exploration of memory, connection, and the blurred lines between reality and illusion.

title: The Dyke Show
overview: From 1979-1984, JEB performed The Dyke Show more than 80 times to packed audiences at community spaces and universities across the US and Canada. Originally titled Lesbian Images in Photography: 1850–1984 and transferred to digital video in 2023, the show includes portraits, documentary and erotic images by historic and contemporary photographers ranging from Alice Austen and Berenice Abbott to Tee Corinne and Leigh Mosley. JEB’s narration is a unique fusion of art history, activist inspiration and stand-up comedy.

title: Olympia In Me
overview: When a high school student transfers to a new school mid-year, silence feels safer than introductions, and making friends seems more daunting than the past left behind. But within the quiet corners of Olympia: a sunlit library, an empty courtyard, a room where thoughts are gently listened to, something shifts.

title: Snail Moves Slowly
overview: A snail and he moves pretty slowly

title: Descent
overview: A group of young college filmmakers follow Logan, a passionate young director who is inspired to make everything authentic. But what happens when his drive and conviction gets in the way of his friends' safety?

title: The Big Book
overview: Darwin works as a fraud surveillance investigator; spying on those with workers' comp claims to see if they are faking their injury or not. When he's not working (and sometimes while on the job) he sponsors young men in AA.

title: Fearless Keys
overview: An introverted young pianist maestro has to overcome his fear of performing in front of people, to not let down the girl he is in love with.

title: Seventy-Five Twenty-One
overview: "Seventy-Five Twenty-One," that captures the struggles and harmony of young and old alike.  Minseok fails the entrance exam for the Korea National University of Arts and moves to Seoul alone to find a place to live. Ara returns to Korea after filming a violin busking abroad. Chunsim, a building owner who dreams of becoming the best silver YouTuber. Their twists and turns on the notifications are a must-see.

title: The 300 Video Award Ceremony
overview: The third ever annual(ish) award ceremony celebrating the last 100 videos posted on the Meat & Bones YouTube channel

title: El hombre que no dejaba de mirar atrás
Mis Ancestros
overview: Guided by ayahuasca, Micaela embarks on a spiritual journey into the memory of her lineage. Mis Ancestros (My Ancestors) is the first piece in the ENRAIZAR universe, a visual and sound ritual where body, nature, and spirit intertwine to honor the living heritage that dwells in our DNA. Through visions, dance, and music, Micaela gives thanks to those who survived, fought, and loved before her. This video clip celebrates roots, identity, and the healing power of art.

title: Bitter Angels
overview: Two young women kidnap a billionaire. Venom wants revolution, Angel wants revenge.

title: Storm over Hateg Island
overview: During a rainy day of the Late Cretaceous, we follow a variety of Hateg island animals such as Hatzegopteryx, Tethyshadros, Paludititan, Sabresuchus, Balaur bondoc, an enantiornithine, and many more.

title: Voluto
overview: In a dark and lonely forest lives Camilla, an old and ugly witch who longs for beauty and love. One morning, she stumbles upon an unfamiliar object and is confronted with her distorted reality. Determined to change, Camilla turns to dark magic-but the price is heavier than she expected. Is beauty worth the cost?

title: Loyalty Check
overview: One shakedown by an authoritarian government is all it takes.

title: Blackwoods
overview: In the face of rising mental health challenges among black men, therapist Dillon leads 5 friends on a weekend retreat at a secluded cabin, where they confront their inner demons and rediscover the healing power of brotherhood in Blackwoods.

title: Capturing the Electrons
overview: Capturing the Electrons documents the life and career of Nobel Prize-winning Hungarian physicist Ferenc Krausz. His research team has generated and measured the first attosecond light pulse and used it for capturing electrons' motion inside atoms, marking the birth of attophysics. In 2023, jointly with Pierre Agostini and Anne L'Huillier, he was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics.

title: Morana: A Long Way Home
overview: Upon learning the news that a meteor that will collide with Earth in just a few days time, a man anxiously waits and wonders if his brother, who lives on another continent, will make it home in time before the world ends.

title: The Road in Between
overview: A melodrama depicting the journey of a man from the Road View filming crew with a keen eye for direction and a woman who is not good at finding her father on the road.

title: Ryan Nasty: The Ideal Man
overview: Message from the Filmmaker: This film was never meant to be seen. It was Ryan’s idea to create a film about himself, but unhappy with the results he ordered it to be destroyed. As the filmmaker, I found it important this footage be released. Ryan believes himself to be the ideal man, but upon interviewing him I realized that it’s not so much that he takes extreme pride in his masculinity, but rather his greatest fear is being perceived as feminine. Rarely have I encountered a man as full of it as Ryan.

title: Night of the Living Morons
overview: Appropriated footage from NIGHT OF THE LIVING DEAD, the film tells a story of a group of people bound together in a house hiding from insane republicans as they kill innocent people.

title: House // Tenants
overview: Documentary about a house and the people who live inside of it.

title: Love 119
overview: “Love 119” is part of Riize’s 1st mini-album Riizing. This pop dance song that has a dreamy atmosphere with a sweet mellow piano riff and drum beat is about the feeling of falling in love for the first time. It express the emotions felt when falling in love in a dreamy and melancholic manner.

title: The Debate
overview: Rising tensions in America. Nick Casal and Kevin Alcazar are set to face off in their first debate of the 2024 election, moderated by Eric Shun. Both candidates will address the issues in the country such as the ongoing wars, inflation, and more.

title: Inner Reckoning
overview: A highschooler has to fight off his inner demons while attempting to finish a short film for an application.

title: BRINK
overview: Out of work and desperate for money, a struggling family man plots an elaborate scheme to secure a cash grab that would exceed his drug-fueled ambitions.

title: Girls Never Die
overview: This project follows the resilience of women, symbolising their empowerment and ability to overcome failure and hardship, and how 24 different women from a multitude of lives came together as 1.

title: Pigeon People
overview: Pigeons, pigeons everywhere, sweet little birds, or domestic terrorists. The people of Leeds weigh up the big question. Are pigeons with the people or are pigeons against the people? PIGEON PEOPLE PIGEON PEOPLE PIGEON PEOPLE!!

title: Eurovision: The Most Controversial Edition
overview: Eurovision: The Most Controversial talks about the controversy that happened at the Eurovision Song Contest in 2024 in Sweden.

title: Yalla Cinema
overview: A group of friends are brought together by chance to meet again and resolve a dispute that occurred in the past, despite their different personalities and motivations. However, they agree to go to their favourite place. Will they succeed in overcoming all the obstacles that stand in the way of their passion?

title: The Cobra Kai Movie
overview: A bullied teen embarks on his journey to become heroic, taking inspiration from the Netflix show, Cobra Kai. With the help of the people that made Cobra Kai possible, he finally overcomes his lack of confidence and defeats his high school bully.

title: Dream Sequence
overview: A young woman wakes up from a long daydream, but soon begins to doubt whether she is truly awake or if everything is just a dream.

title: A True Act of Comedy
overview: In a society desensitized to extreme horror and violence, a young aspiring writer, Robin, grapples with the changing times and his mentally unstable best friend, Reggie, who will do whatever it takes to reach the top.

title: I Hate AI
overview: An actor discovers his identity and look has been stolen and replicated by AI.

title: Emerge & Fade
overview: Two figures —an angel bathed in light and a widow veiled in mourning— mirror each other’s gestures.  Through the interplay of costume, color, and hand-drawn intervention, Emerge & Fade explores how innocence and disillusion coexist and transform one another.

title: Dentro de Mim Passa Um Rio
MIC DROP - A Hip Hop Short Film
overview: A struggling rapper comes to terms with his ex-girlfriend's commercial success.

title: to the stranger who has loved you all your life
overview: An experimental short film that traces the emotional landscape of life after heartbreak. Through intimate narration and cinematography, the film reflects on time, healing, and the rediscovery of self. A quiet yet cinematic portrait of learning to love the stranger within, and rediscovering the beauty of simply being alive.

title: Conexões da Noite: Moda e Subcultura Paulistana
The Restless
overview: After Rutherford falls into a manic episode, his dreams start to become independant. Almost like another Person... This Silent film with an original Soundtrack follows Rutherford navigating his repression in his dreams as they start to feel realer and realer.

title: Love & Moral
overview: A young womans search for morality leads her to a schizophrenic break...

title: B:ARE!
overview: Melek (12) is a 5th grade elementary school student who was the subject of a joke from his teacher, Mr. Koqhar (40). This made her feel ostracized in front of the class. Therefore, she sought out the answer and revealed the secret of her name to her father at home. But when she brought the answer back to class, Melek realized that it wasn't the answer that mattered, but the courage to speak up in front of her

title: What's Beyond a Broken Mirror?
overview: An abstract adventure exploring the anxiety of a young mans journey leaving home.

title: The Last Temptation
overview: A man finds himself trapped in the world of Faust, where he must confront his deepest nightmares and desires. He meets devil and a pale girl in this world, and to set the girl free, he must make a choice and do sacrifice. At the end, he makes the girl leave the hell she's trapped in, and as the payment, he becomes the devil of the world as the previous devil exits.

title: Arabella
overview: After Arabella wishes for fame and attention, her world opens up in an entirely new way. But when she tries to hold her audience's attention spans in more desperate ways, she realizes fame isn't as perfect as she thought.

title: my life through my eyes
overview: A short experimental film that explores one filmmaker’s journey to preserve fleeting moments before they fade. Created as a heartfelt introduction into Koen's film making journey, the film blends nostalgic visuals with inventive storytelling techniques, exploring childhood dreams, the fear of forgetting, and the impulse to document life as it unfolds. This marks Koen’s first true dive into editing and cinematography, born from years of unfinished projects, it stands as a heartfelt introduction to a lifelong pursuit of storytelling, dedicated to the child in all of us who once dreamed.

title: Fly High Mono
overview: The little mannequin, once content to be sketched, now longs to escape the confines of the canvas.

title: Deadmate
overview: In a quiet small town, a shocking murder sets the board, and every resident is a piece in a dangerous game. As a determined investigator maneuvers through secrets and lies, each move reveals hidden motives, forcing the town’s players into a high-stakes match where one wrong step could be fatal.

title: The strange case of detective Jones
overview: Two street girls are slain on consecutive nights, their murders echoing a sinister pattern. When a third victim — an amateur model — turns up dead, panic spreads through the city, and whispers of a modern “Jack the Ripper” begin. Detective Jones, recently divorced and battling his own demons, is forced to chase the killer through a spiral of violence where each night brings a new victim… and darker surprises.

title: A' Gabhail Ris
overview: A man misses out on life and the end of the world because he’s too busy dwelling on a bad break up.

title: Strike: The Battle of the Four Clans
overview: After the rise of a government threat, the four clans (Administrative Artisans, Sorcerer Teachers, Postgraduate Reapers, and Student Warriors) will unite to confront it. Conflict and bloodshed will be inevitable in a battle for rights.

title: From the Ashes
overview: A suicidal girl finds herself inexplicably unable to kill herself.

title: Oblitus
overview: Oblitus, a substance capable of making you remember and forget memories, becomes the addiction of a man desperate to find his family.

title: Nick Eh 30: The Movie
overview: Nick Eh 30 goes on a wild ride after a big mistake

title: The Veiled Abyss
overview: This found footage short film revolves around Holly, an influencer and singer, who ends up in a mysterious convent/refuge after a car accident. She befriends long term residents of the refuge, Bella and Kayleigh. As things become increasingly sinister Bella, Holly and Kayleigh begin to question the true intentions of the sisters

title: With Each Passing Day...
overview: Mrs. Piedade is an old mouse who lives in a small village in the mountainous interior of Portugal. Her existence is mainly composed of loneliness and memories, and a hardened routine, guided by the regular beat of the clock and the tea she drinks with her friends, two sisters, who live in the same village. The accumulation of this routine will awaken in Mrs. Piedade the desire to break it. Drawn on to a strong memory that prevents her from acting, she returns to where she was once happy hoping to regain some kind of new happiness.

title: Teeth
overview: The musical adaptation of the 2007 film of the same name, following Dawn O'Keefe, an evangelical teenager, who is navigating the challenges of adolescent dating and chastity when she discovers she has teeth in her vagina.

title: Joelma - Isso É Calypso Tour Brasil: Ao Vivo em Belém
overview: Recorded on November 24, 2023, at the imposing Mangueirão Stadium, in Belém do Pará, this DVD marks another exciting chapter in Joelma's solo career as part of the ambitious Isso É Calypso Tour Brasil project.

title: Joelma - Isso É Calypso Tour Brasil: Ao Vivo em Recife
overview: The DVD Isso É Calypso Tour Brasil: Ao Vivo em Recife features Joelma reviving a vibrant energy with her greatest hits live, recorded at Classic Hall in December 2022 and released in 2024.

title: Our American Dream
overview: From Detroit to Manchester and Boston, countless American towns, streets, and rivers bear French names. But why?  Notre rêve américain follows rapper Biz and globe-trotter Jean-Michel Dufaux as they trace the forgotten stories of French Canadians who helped shape American history. Through interviews, archival footage, and on-the-ground exploration, the film uncovers a legacy erased from mainstream narratives — and calls for a renewed connection to this cultural heritage.

title: Pylades & Orestes
overview: A man's world is turned upside down when he falls in love with a woman who challenges everything he's ever known. But the real complication arises when he realizes that his deepest love may not be for her, but for his longtime best friend.

title: Beyond Time
overview: A journey that promised freedom turns into a nightmare that haunts one man. Now, he is forced to return and confront the mistakes that caused him to lose himself and everyone he loved.

title: Heels
overview: With the help of his supportive mother, a young Puerto Rican man prepares for his first performance as a Drag Queen — while trying to keep it a secret from his conservative, domineering father.

title: jornal boçal
overview: [sinopse in analysis]

title: Devil on Stalk
overview: Kevin Texis shares an experience that brought him dangerously close to demonic possession, leaving an indelible mark on his life. His testimony reveals a chilling encounter with supernatural forces that challenged all notions of reality.

title: Kaku Kamu
overview: In a quiet town in Pampanga, a young closeted man grapples with his hidden emotions for his best friend, but as he attempts to navigate the complexities of his feelings, a chilling horror emerges, triggered by the presence of a mysterious girl who brings a haunting darkness to their once serene land.

title: False Hope
overview: A lost soul tries to navigate his way through the spawn of his guilty conscience.

title: THE TAKEN
overview: In “The Taken” when a family outing turns into a nightmare as his loved ones are abducted before his eyes, Adrian, a devoted husband and father, embarks on a relentless mission to rescue them. Fueled by desperation and determination, Adrian channels the courage of action movie heroes as he battles through a series of intense fight scenes inspired by iconic action films of the past. From gritty hand-to-hand combat to adrenaline-pumping car chases, Adrian’s unwavering resolve is put to the ultimate test. Will Adrian’s determination be enough to overcome the odds and reunite with his loved ones, or will he be forced to confront the harsh realities of his mission? “The Taken” is a pulse-pounding short film that explores the lengths a father will go to protect his family in the face of adversity.

title: El Soldador
overview: A naturalistic story about the realities of healthcare and houselessness from the perspective of Ramon Duarte, a houseless welder who receives care from Miami Street Medicine, a street medicine team. In Miami, where rising housing costs are forcing folks onto the streets, the doctor's work is more important than ever.

title: I'm Staying Alive
overview: A short film that covers one episode of “Zoranova pošta”podcast. When Zoran, the host, welcomes a new guest, the conversation takes an unexpected turn.

title: Innermost Heart
overview: What happens when two eccentric individuals—a grandfather and his grandson—are forced to spend an entire weekend together? Based on stories and screenplay written by Olivér Gömbös, a young creator on the autism spectrum. For many years, Olivér has been expressing himself and his view of the world through unique film narratives. With a talented creative team and outstanding actors, director Tamás Németh Pákolicz has helped bring Olivér’s greatest cinematic dream to life.

title: Please Come Home
overview: After the tragic loss of their wife and mother, Harry and Ann find themselves emotionally adrift. As the mother's birthday approaches, they must both navigate their way through grief in order to reconnect to make it through the day.

title: The Documentary
overview: Xan García, in search of the meaning of things, interviews 13 classmates to discuss and reflect on life. They talk about death, love, happiness, and life itself. Finally, upon finishing high school, the 13 participants say goodbye and embrace the future that awaits them: the adult world. "An exhilarating story" - Ian Porto

title: Your Song
overview: Caught between the expectations of academic responsibilities and the pull of her passion for music, Skylar finds herself torn between two worlds. Struggling to decide what to do with her life, her rival offers an unexpected opportunity to join her rock band. Now, Skylar must navigate rivalry, ambition, and self-discovery, as she faces the ultimate choice: stay on the safe path or take a leap into the unknown.

title: ILLVILLE
overview: While law enforcement works overtime to cure Illville’s drug problem, Officer Jimmy Lynch kills a teenage boy. Unbeknownst to Jimmy, the boy is the nephew of the notorious drug lord, Slim.

title: Clausible Deniability
overview: Santa Claus has been murdered. It is up to the crack-team of detectives Sylvester Slydewisel and Eliza Eggnog to solve the case that leads them to mysterious suspects, late-stage capitalism, and their own inner demons.

title: Rupert: First Blood
overview: A prequel to 2024's "No Country for Old Horse" showing how Rupert got his start as a killer

title: No Country for Old Horse
overview: 3 teens, 1 very intoxicated dad, and 1 killer. Who will survive or, a better question what will be left of them?

title: SAKUIKAZUCHI
overview: Sakuikazuchi, ascending to Takamagahara, is gliding there quietly. Don't be deceived by its dazzling beauty...Just as a destructive force was born from Izanami's ruined body after she lost her former beauty, there is also a destructive power hidden behind this beauty, waiting to emerge. Although it appears calm, this calmness actually signals a great catastrophe to us.

title: Full stop!
overview: Full stop! is an experimental film that uses symbolic gestures of a high school student to explore daily life and broader social issues, particularly the responsibility of public officials for the tragedy that occurred on November 1, 2024, at the Novi Sad Railway Station.  The main character of the film is not a person, but an ordinary pencil, which becomes a symbol of the everyday actions and inner struggles of a young person growing up in a system of deeply corrupted values. The pencil leaves a mark of our thoughts, aspirations, and reality. Its smallest trace is a dot, a full stop. However, to come to a full stop with injustice is a necessary and at the same time a great act.

title: Weird Time
overview: A dog, Hudson, hates this time of the year.  While the leaves are blowing in the wind, and the snow begins to fall down from the sky, all of the best smells are about. Hudson however, never gets to enjoy any of them.  Stuck inside on a cold late-autumn day, Hudson desperately tries to get what he desires.

title: Botes
overview: Saúl, a young graffiti artist caught between a broken home and street life, forms an unexpected bond with Botes. As they dive deeper into the world of graffiti, a police arrest forces them to face the consequences. Saúl must choose between repeating the past or building a new future.

title: The videographer
overview: A short family trip to the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region of France.

title: Jonathan Bree: Live in Mexico City
overview: Captured during his 18 country, 52 date Pre-Code Hollywood world tour of 2023, this document arrives not as a slick souvenir via expensive rigs or polished crews, but as a séance. Shot on vintage cameras of a pre-internet era, the image breathes with the artifacts of another time — streaked, unstable, alive.  Intercut with fragments of phone footage shared by Bree’s fanatics scattered through the dark of the crowd, it gains a visceral, immersive edge.

title: The Long Walk Back to the Bed
overview: A girl embarks on the perilous journey from lightswitch to bed.

title: Jumpstart
overview: Jumpstart follows 26-year-old Virginia ‘Billie’ Walton as she chokes on a healthy dose of reality. Trading her mother’s opulent lifestyle for a beaten-up Toyota, Billie hits the road with nothing but her car, cigarettes, and absolutely zero life skills. But when basin-bathing at gas stations loses its charm, Billie has to face her worst nightmare - finding a job. Armed with nothing but her silver tongue, can Billie talk her way into employment before her luck runs out?

title: Confessions in Static
overview: When a real-life house of horror is reopened as a tourist attraction, four friends decide to teach the inhabitants a lesson. But nothing is what it seems, and nobody is telling the truth in this darkly comic twist on the found footage movie.

title: Sonder
overview: A short film directed by Siddharth Tripathy and Shaaz Aryan.  Sonder is an ode to the realisation that everyone around us has lives as complex and vivid as our own.  Dedicated to the lives of those close to me.

title: Chickadee Overcomes Gravity
overview: Stuck on the ground but dreaming of the stars, an audacious chicken sets out to go where no chicken has gone before. Created collaboratively with young artists using everyday tools, smartphones, and imagination. Bok bok!

title: Prison and Time
overview: Formerly incarcerated writer Marvin Wade speaks personally about his 25 years in prison and the positive transformation he achieved in spite of, not because of, the criminal legal system around him.

title: CEO IN THE HOUSE
overview: Fate changes over a mobile call when Vignesh's mother calls him in between a meeting with his Team Lead who doesn't gave him any promotion.

title: Wallace & Gromit a Barbour Christmas
overview: It’s Christmas time for Wallace and Gromit
An opulent deaf man embarks on a journey of self-discovery.

title: Tenna’s TV Training
overview: Mr (Ant) Tenna gives a presentation on his five “TV-Tastic Tips” on how to make it big on TV!

title: Mean Boys
overview: Archer High- A flashy LA school open to all people and sexualities. Between drama at The Grind and never-ending crushes there's trouble about.

title: Premiere of the Dead
overview: It's Halloween night. Three friends prepare to attend the premiere of the latest installment in their favorite teen-slasher film franchise. However, their plans are interrupted by the untimely arrival of the zombie apocalypse. Outnumbered and outmatched, they confront their doom head-on and resolve to reach the premiere anyways. The question is: will they make it there alive?

title: The Door
overview: A man wakes up in the desert, where a mysterious door and guide stand before him.

title: Stronger with Don Saladino - Sebastian Stan
overview: Sebastian Stan Gets Real About Failure, Growth, and Staying Authentic while lying about his phone screentime.

title: muita gente
overview: a short film about the end of the world. filmed with an old digicam at a park on all souls’ day, 2025. two best friends talk about turtles and watch people in their natural habitat while listening to tomate cereja.

title: UNIX
overview: When a man takes up a job at a computer systems company, he must complete tasks that challenge his ability to comply to moral protocol.

title: Watch The Cat
overview: When a struggling cat sitter takes on a very last minute job, she is given three simple instructions: feed it twice a day, don't forget to give it water, and don't let it go outside.

title: Where The Fog Breathes
overview: Adrift in the endless fog of the open sea, a lone ship wanders through still waters. Whispers rise from the depths, hinting at something unseen. As day bleeds into night, unease thickens with the fog. Time stretches thin, reality frays, and the crew drifts further from certainty. The calm is hauntingly beautiful, but it carries a weight no one can escape.

title: Cambrian, Cradle of the Phanerozoic
overview: A trip through the Middle Cambrian, just over half a billion years ago. Featuring a variety of Trilobites, Radiodonts, Conodonts, Stylophoran Echinoderms, Pikaia, Lobopodians, Vetulicola, early Molluscs, and various other early animals.

title: The Real Dust Busters
overview: Two scientists, Anton Black (Noah Lee), and Decker Hopkins (Will Pletcher), must reunite to fight the experiments created by Theo Darwain (Joshua Hall) the evil CEO of Dust Industries. Can the two crack pot inventors scrape together to save the world as we know it, or will they bite the dust?

title: By Dawn
overview: In a shadowed, century-old art studio, a thousand-year-old vampire devotes himself to capturing a mysterious woman, torn between obsession and regret. yet some creations carry a price all must face.

title: Entre aulas e barricadas: dez anos das ocupações das escolas na cidade de São Paulo
ma grand-mère aime les raisins moisis
Expediente Warra: La Peluca Maldita (the Contouring)
Mariya Markova: Good Evening
overview: Mariya Markova's first solo stand-up concert

title: RING RING
overview: A grieving son buys a mysterious phone from an antique shop in order to talk to his late mother.

title: October Glow
overview: A film that presents a child's perspective of Halloween

title: Lost and Found
overview: The MV captures the members in various moments that evoke a cinematic music drama: from the band practicing together, to Gaon and Jooyeon running somewhere, O.de and Jun Han, Jungsu deep in thought, and Gun Il observing something with a focused gaze. Each scene reflects a unique facet of youth.  The song is about someone waiting endlessly for love that never comes back. They feel lost, tired, and hopeless, wishing to be noticed or let go completely. It captures the pain of waiting, the loneliness of being forgotten, and the desire to be found again.

title: LEGION
overview: One night in an argument with his girlfriend, Natale, Robert commits a sin, a horrible dreadful sin. All alone, he meets a figure who’s nice, polite and welcoming. The figure offers him a chance for that night to go away; will Robert cheat and take the deal or own up to what he’s done. I ask you. Would you take that easy road? That chance to gain whatever you want from the grasp of someone else’s hand? Would you cheat at this game of life… or work for it?

title: Vô
overview: An animated short film that shows the relationship between a girl, her grandfather, and a little bird. A series of everyday events, ranging from daily meals to car rides, demonstrate the closeness and friendship between the two. A film about love, longing, and cherished memories.

title: A City Fights Back: How LA Defends Itself from ICE
overview: As ICE raids intensify across Los Angeles, a high school teacher leads the grassroots resistance.

title: Thanksgiving, Again?!
overview: When Tori volunteers to host her husband's loud Italian family for Thanksgiving, she finds herself stuck in a time loop, forced to survive endless rounds of overbearing relatives, family drama, and way too much turkey.

title: Ocular Silence
overview: A young woman steps out of the shower and discovers something strange on her face.

title: TINI en vivo: FUTTTURA
overview: Enjoy FUTTTURA, the festival by Tini created as an immersive experience for her fans to relive their favorite songs in a unique way. From Violetta to the present, Tini takes you through every stage of her journey in a magical, thrilling, and unmissable adventure.

title: One Last Meal
overview: A young man gets a visit from a very unexpected guest.

title: Home
overview: A young man works day and night to visit his sick mother back home.

title: The dream of Grisel
overview: Grisel reminisces about her youth through the transformative experience of participating in an independent Argentine film in the 1970s, based on Cortázar's short story "End of the Game." From a set that recreates her memories, Grisel shares objects, letters, and family mementos she still cherishes, and evokes the emotion of playing Leticia, the central character in that now-lost film. Through archival footage and set reconstructions, the documentary explores nostalgia, the passage of time, and the indelible mark that cinema leaves on those who experience it.

title: Against All Odds
overview: Against All Odds is the gripping sequel to Try That Again, following Jason, Jocelyn, and the enigmatic bartender Lexian as they navigate the dangerous consequences of Jason’s repeated manipulations of time. Hunted by Xaldin, a relentless enforcer of the natural order, the trio must outwit their pursuer and confront the ripple effects of their past choices. Every decision carries weight, and survival may demand sacrifices they never imagined. Can they stay one step ahead of destiny itself—against all odds?

title: The Foreign Shoes
overview: A seven-year-old boy eagerly awaits the football shoes his father promised to bring him from abroad. But when he opens the suitcase, he finds an unrelated pair of men’s shoes instead. The boy’s innocent attempts to turn those shoes into the football boots he had dreamed of lead him into a series of bittersweet and humorous adventures.

title: Kōauau
overview: Ty discovers a kōauau on a beach, which causes him to repeat the same day over and over again. Frustrated and desperate, Ty must figure out how to break the cycle and free himself from the kōauau.

title: "Ele não chega sozinho: A entrega vem primeiro
Leave No Trace
overview: A routine school newspaper interview spirals out of control when one reporter accuses a beloved teacher of being an environmental fraud.

title: Venezuelan Blues
overview: Jaro, a young Venezuelan immigrant and aspiring musician, lands his first gig at a Chicago blues club, but his clothes are beat up. Desperate to make a good impression, he scrambles for quick cash. Maybe he could sell a hip-hop beat he’s been working on. Will it be enough to get him on stage looking fresh, though?

title: After the Rain
overview: Kong was stuck in the rain at the faculty, so he went to take shelter in the activity room and met Beam, a classmate he had a crush on.

title: A Friend In Me
overview: Sam, a young ghost-hunter, brings home a mysterious VHS tape.

title: Hôtel Minéral
overview: On the edge of the ring road, at the top of a concrete tower block, Mapi listens every night to the voice messages sent to her by Gabi, her boyfriend whom she has mysteriously stopped answering. With summer approaching, the floor is gradually emptying, and the few remaining tenants would like to understand their friend's silence. But within the walls of the Hôtel Minéral, it seems difficult for anyone to re-establish communication.

title: The Rebuke
overview: HKU first year student project.

title: Voice
overview: A journey into the life of blind jazz musician Caitlin Smith as she explores how her voice as a musician and teacher has become a tool of identity, resilience, and empowerment.

title: WeirdWorld
overview: A small disillusioned creature searches for meaning in an increasingly weird world.

title: Tout Va Changer
overview: Sarah and Alex live with their parents in Lebanon and enjoy escaping into their imaginary world. One day, the family receives unexpected news that will change their lives forever.

title: ABSOLUTE CINEMA
overview: A fresh out of university film graduate decides he is fed up with the current state of cinema, with big releases only ever being franchise films or reboots. A documentary crew follows him as he sets out to create the greatest film of all time.

title: The Cringy Life Of A Replaceable Kid
overview: After the school shooting at “Positive Thinking High School”, a socially awkward boy and a teen model drift together into his eccentric mother’s world--pulling them into a tangle of humiliation, absurd beliefs, and questionable life lessons.

title: Death Note Resurrection
overview: Light Yagami’s control over the Death Note is growing, but L is still on the case. Watch the re-imagining of the classic manga in this student film!

title: I Hope It Happened the Way I Think It Did
overview: Made over the course of three days, this film is the culmination of three weeks.

title: Sometimes I Forget What Day of the Week It Is
overview: When something small happens, it's usually over within seconds.

title: M.S.T.W.
overview: This film is dedicated to myself in three years.

title: Thank God for Smart People, or Else I Would Be Dumb 2
overview: The smart people are the reason there are dumb people.

title: The Meditation/McDonald's Conflict
overview: Wyatt must decide what means more to him.

title: Thank God for Smart People, or Else I Would Be Dumb
overview: The smarter someone is, the less you should probably trust them. Given the choice between being smart and dumb, I'd always choose dumb.

title: The Communists are Coming - A Visual Manifesto
overview: This original documentary charts the founding year of the Revolutionary Communist International, up to its inaugural conference in June 2024.

title: MEATCANYON
overview: Obsessed with his declining online relevance, Hunter descends into madness as he extracts grotesque, malformed cartoon ideas from a decaying creature locked in his basement

title: Alessandro Santin
overview: Alessandro Santin

title: The Fearless Flyers // Live in Italy
overview: The Fearless Flyers give a funky performance live in Italy.

title: Podcasters Must Die
overview: TMG Studios’ first short film in the form of a comedic slasher. A killer is on the loose and he’s coming for your favorite podcasters.

title: Stories of Songville
overview: A retelling of Daniel Chapters 1-3 in a world of sci-fi and fantasy. Thralldom, a tyrannical regime has conquered a magical and music-loving land called Songville. Danny, Mish, and Hanan, now exiles, rise from captives to high-ranking overseers under the Iron Master’s rule. They faithfully serve their master while secretly pledging allegiance to the true High King and the ways of Songville. However, as tensions rise and the cost of resistance grows, they must decide whether to risk their lives for the sake of faith and what they truly love— or remain silent in the face of tyranny. Are they willing to put their lives on the line for it?

Ricardo wakes up in a warehouse filled with laboratory artifacts. When he tries to escape, he finds a locked door and mysterious noises coming from outside. Overwhelmed by the desire to recover his memories, he tries to open the door, only to find the truth behind it.

title: JADE - THAT’S SHOWBIZ BABY! THE TOUR from the London Roundhouse
overview: Concert film of JADE’s THAT’S SHOWBIZ BABY! THE TOUR at the Roundhouse in London, England on October 22, 2025.

title: Awkward Gawker
overview: After accidentally going viral, our apologetic hero encounters unhinged adversaries and unhelpful childhood heroes on her quest to keep her job.

title: Lost The Plot
overview: Yung T, an aspiring actor decides to star in an advert to get some attention, only to discover he hasn't made a single dime of it but is noticed by one producer, this all leads him to go down the path of the criminal underworld.

title: Leaving My Mother
overview: A teenage boy gets the opportunity of a lifetime. But to follow his passions and chase his dreams of becoming a magician, he must face his biggest challenge yet - leaving his loving mother.

title: Displacement
overview: An intense conversation between a mother and her child.

title: Al Amal: A Journey of Hope
overview: An animated short documentary crafted by people on the move in the refugee camp of the island of Lesbos (GR), following the story of Orhan, a Syrian Kurd who fled war with his family in 2013, seeking safety in Turkey—only to find that peace was still a distant dream.

"26.2” follows four New Yorkers training for the 2024 NYC Marathon: a retired math teacher, an NYPD administrative aide, a public defender, and an elevator mechanic. Between them, they’ve survived a stroke, cancer, a life-changing house fire, and finishing dead last in the 2023 race. They’re not professional runners. They’re people who’ve been knocked down and decided to keep moving. This isn’t a story about running fast. It’s a story about getting there at all.

title: Grapefruit
overview: A famous kids show goes off the rails ...

title: H4pPy 6iR7hd4y D3n M4rK
overview: Ang munting short film.

title: Fears is a fluke Tears is the root
overview: James is looking for his wife after finding letters she left behind. He stops by a town and meets a few bizarre characters changing his life forever.

title: Gardenia
overview: Two lovers, sharing an afternoon tea, have what could be their final moments of a forbidden love. Faced with the potential of only having the memories of them together left, Julia tries her best to win Elizabeth back, before Elizabeth moves away with her newlywed husband.

title: THE SUPER GUIDE DEFINITELY EPIC FRAGRANT AND BIUTIFUL OF RPG
overview: In this work from IES 025, a group of RPG players from a mystical and distant land, as usual, schedule another regular game. However... everything changes when they receive a visit from a new (and very well-known) player...

title: Vibrations
overview: In an intimate and provocative journey, Vibrations is a documentary-essay that explores the filmmaker’s complex relationship with explicit imagery and his own sexuality. Born into a Catholic family and struggling to put his homosexuality into words, the director finds in pornography a space for self-exploration and acceptance. The film dives into the nuances of alternative pornography, challenging stigmas and revealing how desire, identity, and the politics of the body intertwine both on screen and in life. A work that pulses between the personal and the universal, Vibrations challenges perceptions and invites a rediscovery of pleasure and freedom through the image.

title: Anachronist
overview: Waking to a door shutting, Aswin finds his roommate Alan and the entire building deserted. As friends fade in and out, and the hostel twists into a maze, Aswin is trapped in a terrifying, inescapable loop of collapsing reality.
